General.Name: TELUS International
General.Description: TELUS International (Cda) Inc. offers digital customer experience and digital solutions in the Asia-Pacific, the Central America, Europe, Africa, North America, and internationally. The company provides digital solutions, such as cloud solutions and automation, trust, safety, and security services; and AI data solutions, including expertise in computer vision, front-end digital design, and consulting services, as well as data collection, data annotation, supporting applications like computer vision, data categorization, and search relevance for AI applications. It also offers Customer Experience Management (CXM) solution; and Fuel iX, a TELUS Digital's proprietary platform that enables organizations to manage, monitor, and maintain GenAI across the enterprise. The company serves technology and games, communications and media, electronic commerce (eCommerce), financial technology (fintech), banking, financial services and insurance, healthcare, retail, consumer, energy and utilities, and travel and hospitality industries. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. TELUS International (Cda) Inc. operates as a subsidiary of TELUS Communications Inc.
General.Address: 510 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 0M3
